name: Jam & Jelly: Crash Landed
description:
Jam & Jelly have crash landed!  Collect 3 Gems and return to the Rocket to win!

Jam & Jelly: Crash Landed! is a Co-Op Rougelite Platformer.

A controller  is optional to play. Single player and Co-Op modes are available.
Mouse & Keyboard support coming soon!

Controls:
Left stick to move
Right stick to look around
 A to Jump
Y to switch characters

WASD -  Player 1 movement & camera

Arrow  Keys - Player 2 movement & camera

R key - Switch

Space - Player1 Jump

Right Shift / Right  Command / Right Ctrl - Player 2 Jump

This game is was made for #MiniJam 98 :  Empty

Other than a few textures, everything in this game was made from scratch for this game.
